result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marquile Lamont Latson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marquile Lamont Latson appeared by video.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court for Marquile Lamont Latson.  Attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Gamino is now the attorney of record. Defense does not have discovery or an offer.  Case is adjourned to 11-11-22 at 8:30 am for status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marquile Lamont Latson appeared by video.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino appeared by video for Marquile Lamont Latson.  Prosecuting attorney Jessica Ann Behling in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense is requesting the no contact be modified to allow visits with child. Victim makes a statement.  Arguments heard.  Court denied defense request to modify the no contact order. 
Attorney Gamino was just appointed to the case and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 10-12-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Marquile Lamont Latson in court.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defendant requests additional time hire an attorney.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with S.N.G., and her child M.A.L.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.
  Court ordered Defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Marquile Lamont Latson in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Marquile Lamont Latson in custody.  Sarah Mackenzie Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.    DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
